2021 UPDATE: Most elective classes are expected to be conducted online for the Fall 2021 semester. Google Classroom will be used for most course information and assignment submissions, and also for any outside of class contact with the teacher. Email the teacher at mjchang@kwansei.ac.jp to get the Google Classroom site code to register. This course is centered mainly on discussions based on the textbook and test-taking skill topics. This is an interactive style course, it requires interactive English only discussions with classmates every lesson.
<Information for students permitted to take classes online>
Sessions will be held simultaneously via Zoom (meeting code will be posted on the Google Classroom site). Lesson details will be updated on the Google Classroom site by 5:30 pm the day before our class time.
*If the pandemic situation changes in September - October, students can check the Google Classroom site for teacher updated information and students will also be contacted individually by their KGU e-mail addresses to explain about online classes classes and assignments.
**If classes are to be held online, all classes will be live using Zoom for synchronous style classes via Zoom.

This is an all-English classroom. Students can expect to communicate with the teacher and other students in English only. Assignments may require the use of a computer and online sites.

Additionally, this class is taught communicatively and the class functions as a community in which all members support each other. This means that students can expect to interact regularly through pair work or small groups to review course content and/or will have consistent interaction with the teacher.
